list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: express warm approval or admiration of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we can't praise Chris enough—he did a brilliant job
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng ta không thể khen ngợi Chris đủ, anh ta đã làm một công việc tuyệt vời

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the expression of approval or admiration for someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the audience was full of praise for the whole production
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khán giả đầy lời khen ngợi cho toàn bộ sản xuất
